trans-unit.source: Defines methods that allow an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm" /> class to enumerate key container information, and import and export Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI)–compatible key blobs.
trans-unit.target: Define métodos que permiten a una clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm" /> enumerar la información del contenedor de claves, así como importar y exportar blobs de claves compatibles con la API criptográfica (CAPI) de Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: Classes that extend the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm> class should implement the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ICspAsymmetricAlgorithm> interface to enumerate key container information using a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo> object, and to import and export Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI)–compatible key blobs.
trans-unit.target: Las clases que extienden la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm> clase debe implementar la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ICspAsymmetricAlgorithm> interfaz para enumerar información del contenedor de claves mediante un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo> objeto y para importar y exportar API criptográfica de Microsoft (CAPI) – BLOB de clave compatible.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo" /> object that describes additional information about a cryptographic key pair.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo" /> que describe la información adicional sobre un par de claves criptográficas.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo" /> object that describes additional information about a cryptographic key pair.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo" /> que describe información adicional sobre un par de claves criptográficas.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo> object specifies whether the key is exportable, and provides the key container name, information about the provider, and other information.
trans-unit.target: El valor devuelto <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo> objeto especifica si la clave es exportable y proporciona el nombre de contenedor de claves, información sobre el proveedor y otra información.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include the private key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para incluir la clave privada; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Exports a blob that contains the key information associated with an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Exporta un blob que contiene la información de clave asociada a un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm" />.

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the key information associated with an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de bytes que contiene la información de clave asociada a un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ICspAsymmetricAlgorithm.ExportCspBlob%2A> method returns a blob that contains key information that is compatible with the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI).
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ICspAsymmetricAlgorithm.ExportCspBlob%2A> método devuelve un blob que contiene información de la clave que es compatible con la API criptográfica de Microsoft (CAPI) no administrada.

trans-unit.source: A byte array that represents an asymmetric key blob.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de bytes que representa un blob de clave asimétrica.

trans-unit.source: Imports a blob that represents asymmetric key information.
trans-unit.target: Importa un blob que representa información de clave asimétrica.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ICspAsymmetricAlgorithm.ImportCspBlob%2A> method initializes the key data of an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm> object using a blob that is compatible with the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI).
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ICspAsymmetricAlgorithm.ImportCspBlob%2A> método inicializa los datos de clave de un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm> objeto mediante un blob que es compatible con la API criptográfica de Microsoft (CAPI) no administrada.
